'''Stamina''' is a player statistics in ''[[Strife]]'', which increases the maximum {{Property|Health}} value and affects the damage computation in [[A_JabDagger]]. It starts at 0 and maxes at 100.
Stamina is increased by {{Class|UpgradeStamina}} items which are granted at various points during the game.
It can be set for custom actors with the {{Property|Stamina}} property, accessed from [[ACS]] with [[ACS actor properties|APROP_Stamina]], and used in [[DECORATE expressions]].
The [[alternate HUD]] will show the player's current [[accuracy]] and stamina if {{c|hud_showstats}} is true. [[Category:Glossary]][[Category:Strife]]
